headline: PPG again recognized among Foundry’s Computerworld’s Best Places to Work in IT
summary: PITTSBURGH, December 10, 2024--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced that it has been recognized among the "Best Places to Work in Information Technology (IT) in 2025" by Foundry’s Computerworld. It is PPG’s seventh appearance on the prestigious list, which recognizes organizations that challenge their IT staffs while providing great benefits and compensation.
